    Montero, Ruiz-Peinado, and Munoz (2005)

    montero_2005.Rd

    Allometric models from Montero, Ruiz-Peinado, and Munoz (2005)

    Tree Biomass Models

    bt = cf * exp(a) * dsob^b

    • bt [kg] - tree biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    Model Parameters

    • bt [kg] - tree biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    bf = cf * exp(a) * dsob^b

    Branch Biomass Models

    bb = cf * exp(a) * dsob^b

    • bb [kg] - branch biomass

    • dsob [cm] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height
